Kids were getting nosey round the bedroom door while we were wrapping so we started making wild sex noises and that soon got rid of them. The magic of Xmas preserved once more. #parenting
@sjksanders Good woman. It is entirely possible to plan on avoiding it in very many situations once they’re recognised as unnecessary flash points, I’ve found. 😘

@sjksanders It’s the power of ordering a good deal of Xmas food from Cook, tbh. Also man’s had most of Dec. off due to contract terms so we’ve both done little & often in terms of prep for a few weeks now. I have to avoid stress like the plague because of PMDD so I organise like fuck.

My neighbour Margaret has been scoring my man’s mince pies over text today. She’s in her late 70s, sharp as a tack, out at 7 every morning to leg it to the shops for her paper. Love her. 🖤 PS leave his random topping pastry alone. Life’s now too short for lattices. https://t.co/OevhsydYQ2

@sarasheridan Now come on, I'm thinking that's probably a light week for you... ;-) Btw I have your pressie and I am planning to drop in with it like the Milk Tray woman. Coming soon on your security cams, genuinely excited. 😂

I've written twenty-five thousand words this week and I am SO IN LOVE with the story I'm telling. Super-emosh. Day off writing tomorrow, meeting an Aberdeen bud in Dundee. Kids singing in ma kitchen. What a bloody fab couple of months I've had :'-) Feeling lucky. 🖤

Novel writing marathon a go-go, 65k of draft one and counting, husband is on hols already so giving me the best Xmas gift possible - fully catered time at my bed desk ;-) My heart’s fluttering - I think (hope) I’m going to do this thing. ♥️ https://t.co/SRQaYmI1a4
